title: How to Make Rhubarb Garden Spray

steps.headline: Place the rhubarb leaves into a large pot.
Bring to the boil and then simmer for 20 minutes to half an hour.
Dilute.
steps.description: The solution should be diluted 1 part solution and 9 parts water; in other words, add 9 litres / 2.3 gallons water to create the spray.

steps.headline: Use.
steps.description: This spray should not be stored but should be used within 24 hours to achieve the best effectiveness.

text: Place the rhubarb leaves into a large pot.  Bring to the boil and then simmer for 20 minutes to half an hour.  Strain off the leaves.  Dilute. The solution should be diluted 1 part solution and 9 parts water; in other words, add 9 litres / 2.3 gallons water to create the spray. Use. This spray should not be stored but should be used within 24 hours to achieve the best effectiveness.
